entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is a bird that soared out of the window with Hedwig. (Text: 'Ten minutes later, Errol and Hedwig...')

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is a bird that soared out of the window with Errol. (Text: 'Errol and Hedwig...')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron has a note bound to Hedwig's leg. (Text: 'who had a note to Ron bound to her leg')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is feeling miserable and has to welcome their guest. (Text: 'But Harry didn’t have long to brood...')

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt who is shrieking for him to come down and get ready. (Text: 'Aunt Petunia was shrieking up the stairs...')

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is Harry's aunt who loves criticizing him and is large, beefy, and purple-faced. (Text: 'On the threshold stood Aunt Marge. She was very like Uncle Vernon...')

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle who has a car that pulled back into the driveway. (Text: 'All too soon, there was a crunch of gravel outside as Uncle Vernon’s car...')
